---
title: "Community"
---

Kristina has been a leader in multiple communities, bringing together people and ideas. 

- Co-led the [Women in Data Science Tucson conference](https://wids-tucson.github.io/) in 2024 and 2025, and had organizing roles since the inception of the event in 2019
- Organized [Drone Day](https://drones.arizona.edu/events/drone-day-2025) in Tucson in 2023, 2024, and 2025
- Helped organize the annual conference for the [US-RSE organization](https://us-rse.org/), as the communications co-chair in 2024 and sponsorship co-chair in 2025
